channel.title: Blueberries on Chef Frank's Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Blueberries on Chef Frank's Recipes

item.title: Blueberry Pie Recipe
item.description: Quick Blueberry Pie Recipe is made from fresh or frozen blueberries, (preferrably from Buchan’s Blueberriesin Traverse City, Michigan out on the Old Mission Penninsula), sugar, lemon juice, and quick tapioca for thickening. Blueberry Pie is a nice dessert for any occasion. Quick Blueberry Pie Ingredients 1 pkg. pie crust (2-9″) 4 c blueberries (Buchan’s Blueberries are the best!) 3/4 c sugar 1 tsp lemon juice 3 tbsp quick tapioca 1/8 tsp salt 1 tsp vanilla ext.
